onSuccess.displayText: After being abandoned by the angels, the young {Player} was found in the wilderness by humans from {_Random:the remote village of {VillageName}|a small, remote village {_Random:called {VillageName}|named {VillageName}}}. The villagers raised him as one of their own, and a quiet and kind child who grew into a strong young man.
choices: {Player} was always eager to help around the village
{Player} often kept to himself, mastering the mysterious powers within him
